bike.description: S-Works Enduro FACT 10m carbon main triangle, Fact IS construction, M5 rear triangle, full cartridge bearing pivots, ISCG mounts, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel

components.description: Fox RP23BV with Boost Valve for Enduro. Ext reb and 3 position ProPedal
1-1/8 - 1 1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing for tapered HT and steer
Specialized Command Post, 3 position, 100mm Adjustable height, Remote Operated, Single bolt head
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frame
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
